## Objective

This is an auto-generated report of a gas sensor test.

## Setup

List all the files in the "Data" directory, then search them for CSV files.  
```{r load_data, echo=FALSE}
listing <- dir("data")

## Search the directory for CSV files.
test_data <- listing[grep(".csv",listing)]
```

Format the data according to our liking.
```{r import_all_data, echo=FALSE}
source("functions.R")

test_set <- data_import()
```

Then generate figures.
```{r generate_figures, echo=FALSE}
generate_plots(1,test_set)
generate_plots(2,test_set)
generate_plots(3,test_set)
generate_plots(4,test_set)
generate_plots(5,test_set)
```

## Including Plots

You can also embed plots, for example:

```{r pressure, echo=FALSE}
plot(pressure)
```

Note that the `echo = FALSE` parameter was added to the code chunk to prevent printing of the R code that generated the plot.
